protocol.text: Roots were collected after 24 or 48 h of exposure to complete (with 50 micromolar of Fe-EDDHA) or â€“Fe (without added Fe) solutions.

Seeds were planted onto rockwool loosely packed into 1.5 ml centrifuge tubes with the bottoms removed. The tubes were floated in foam rafts in containers of nutrient solution. After 10 days, seedlings were transferred to holes in lids of containers contain nutrient solution with constant aeration for an additional 14 days before treatments.
Quiagen RNeasy  extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Drosophila Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G2500A.
The data was analyzed with GeneSpringX (Agilent) using the MAS5 algorithm
